name: CP Analytics pro
author: creativepig

sections.description:
Find out who visited your website in real time, overview your audience, check for bounce rates, social traffic, referrals and other data graphically with CP Analytics Pro
Plugin. It’s free, fast and just the right plugin for you!

View Demo

Features:

  • Fully Responsive and mobile ready
  • Blazing fast performance
  • Super easy installation and 1-Click Authentication process.
  • Lightweight, and born of simplicity, no frills
  • Supports Universal (analytics.js)
  • Group stats by day, month and year
  • Developer-friendly
  • See data for different time periods in your reports
  • Mobile device Statistics
  • Internet And Telecom Statistics
  • Refer to the Page View Sources and average pages / sessions
  • Show all testimonials via a shortcode
  • Overview your audience in terms of keyword, country, city, and determine the source of traffic
  • Device categories, browsers, operating systems, screen resolutions, mobile brands analytics reports

Plugin Information and FAQs

Usage

After installing the CP Analytics Pro Plugin, You need to click on ‘Settings’ to activate your plugin. The steps include:

  1. Click on the ‘Authentication’ button
  2. Log in to the Gmail Account of your website
  3. When you open the link of CP Analytics Pro , you will see a secret access code. You need to copy this access code and paste it on the ‘Your access code’.
  4. Click on save changes. You will have to save twice for the database and server connect.
  5. Select your domain name, click on save changes.
    You will get the analytics report once you complete these steps.
sections.installation:
There are 3 ways to install this plugin:

1. The Easy Method

  1. In your Admin, go to menu Plugins > Add
  2. Search for CP Analytics Pro
  3. Click to install
  4. Activate the plugin
  5. A new option under Settings menu named CP Analytics Pro will appear in your Admin

2. Install Through Zip File

  1. Download the plugin (.zip file) on the right column of this page
  2. In your Admin, go to menu Plugins > Add
  3. Select the tab “Upload”
  4. Upload the .zip file you just downloaded
  5. Activate the plugin
  6. A new option under Settings menu named CP Analytics Pro will appear in your Admin

3. Through FTP

  1. Upload CP Analytics Pro folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. A new option under Settings menu named CP Analytics Pro will appear in your Admin
sections.faq:
I am a non-developer. Can I use the CP Analytics Pro Plugin?

Yes, anyone with or without technical skills can use the CP Analytics Pro Plugin and add beautiful testimonials to their websites.

Do I have to pay for using the CP Analytics Pro Plugin?

No, The CP Analytics Pro plugin is free to use. So you can simply download it and start using instantly.

Will there be any updates of CP Analytics Pro Plugin in the future?

Yes, we will soon come up with the premium updated versions of our CP Analytics Pro plugin.
sections.changelog:
** Version 1.0.0 **
First Version – no errors known as such.
